dict.acceptation: 睡着的；休眠的；麻木的；已死的；
熟睡地；处于麻木不仁的状态；长眠；

sent.orig: Chronic inability to fall asleep or remain asleep for an adequate length of time.
sent.trans: 长期不能入睡或维持相当长一段时间不能入睡。

sent.orig: "I was asleep," cried Mr. Klipspringer, in a spasm of embarrassment. "That is, I'd BEEN asleep.
sent.trans: “我在睡觉，”克利普斯普林格先生窘迫之中脱口而出，“我是说，我本来在睡觉。

sent.orig: I think you looked as if you were half-asleep throughout the song.
sent.trans: 你唱歌的时候，看起来处在半睡眠状态。

sent.orig: Fall asleep, dream Township who insisted on boat Artemisia?
sent.trans: 睡着了，梦里水乡是谁撑着船蒿？

sent.orig: She tiptoed across to the bed where the child lay asleep.
sent.trans: 孩子睡著了，她踮著脚走到他的床前。
